text: The Badminton competition at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games was held in Veracruz, Mexico. The tournament was scheduled to be held from 23–28 November at the Omega Complex. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- ||Singles | | | |- ||Doubles | Kevin Cordon Anibal Marroquin | Rodolfo Ramirez Jonathan Solis | Leodannis Martinez Ernesto Reyes Job Castillo Antonio Ocegueda |- |} ===Women's events=== {| |- ||Singles | | | |- ||Doubles | Haramara Gaitan Sabrina Solis | Cynthia Gonzalez Mariana Ugalde | Beatriz Ramos Nikte Sotomayor Adriana Artiz Tahimara Oropesa |- |} ===Mixed events=== {| |- ||Doubles | Osleni Guerrero Tahimara Oropesa | Job Castillo Sabrina Solis | Jonathan Solis Nikte Sotomayor Anibal Marroquin Beatriz Ramos |- ||Team | Jonathan Solis Nikte Sotomayor Beatriz Ramos Anibal Marroquin Maria del Valle Ana de Leon Rodolfo Ramirez Kevin Cordon | Lino Munoz Haramara Gaitan Job Castillo Antonio Ocegueda Arturo Hernandez Cynthia Gonzalez Mariana Ugalde Sabrina Solis |valign=top| Osleni Guerrero Leodannis Martinez Ernesto Reyes Tahimara Oropeza Adriana Artiz |- |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== *Official Website Category:2014 Central American and Caribbean Games events 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games events Central American and Caribbean Games
title: Badminton at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games
